directions: In microwave dish combine chocolate chips and 1/2 of the cream. Cook on high for 1 to 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds until smooth.  Cool to room temperature. Stir in sugar & vanilla. Set aside.
In small bowl, beat the rest of the cream until soft peaks form.  Beat in chocolate mixture on high speed 1/3 at a time. mix well and spoon into crust.
Refrigerate at least 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie crumb crust
title: Rich Chocolate Truffle Pie
